?resolution: Cant get my ati config to work
Can anyone help me get my ATI config to work, to change my resolution?
Where can I find the xorg.conf file?
open a terminal and type: sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
You can get a terminal by going to Applications->Accessories->Terminal
If you're trying to edit in command-line, use: sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf
But how can I open the location, where the files is?
How do I open the location, wehre the files is?
